General.Name: Sao Mai Group Corp
General.Description: Sao Mai Group Corporation engages in the construction, real estate, aquaculture, travel, and solar power generation businesses in Vietnam. The company undertakes construction and installation works in Mekong Delta, the South East, and the Central Highlands; and develops real estate properties, as well as invest in infrastructure business, residential and urban area, and industrial zone. It also processes and exports aquatic products; constructs civil, industrial, transportation, and irrigation; invests and trades house for sale and long-term lease; processes fish meal and fat; mining; and refined fish oil products. In addition, the company is involved in investing activities; event, communication, commercial advertising activities; and offers restaurants and accommodation services. Sao Mai Group Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Long Xuyen, Vietnam.
